column6: NECROSHA CHAPTER 2 The resurrected dead lay siege to the X-Men's headquarters, and the fight to survive the Black Queen's vengeance begins. But while Warpath and Wolverine realize what's happening, they may be too late to stop it...
column8: | penciller:Carlo Barberi | colorist:Clayton Crain | other:Chris Eliopoulos | letterer:Cory Petit | writer:Duane Swierczynski | writer:Chris Yost
